title: Crab, avocado and bulghur wheat salad
ingredients: ['Bulghur wheat salad', '200 g (7 oz) bulghur wheat', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '3 tbsp lemon juice', '3 tbsp chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '1 tbsp snipped fresh chives', '2 medium-sized tomatoes, diced', 'salt and pepper', 'Crab salad', '340 g (12 oz) fresh white crab meat', '2 avocados', '2 crisp green dessert apples', '125 g (4Â½ oz) bean sprouts', '3 tbsp reduced-fat mayonnaise', '3 tbsp plain low-fat yogurt', '1 tbsp lemon juice', 'small pinch of cayenne pepper', '2 Little Gem lettuces, separated into leaves', '30 g (1 oz) walnut halves, toasted and roughly chopped']
